Portal 2 gra logiczna przepełniona dużą ilością fabuły. Rozwiązujesz zagadki logiczne, słuchasz przy okazji pier******* glaDOS, oraz przeglądasz Youtuba w poszukiwaniu poradnika do lvelu. Kampania jest bardzo klimatyczna i czasami zabawna + jeszcze jest coop. Bardzo polecam [spoiler] Valve pls make portal 3[/spoiler]
很益智的一款独立游戏，闲暇时不妨玩玩

Portal 2 is a fun game as it gives you many puzzles that you have to figure out and the fact that it comes with multiplayer is fun as who doesn't love to crush their friends with spikes. Valve did a fantastic job in making Portal 2

Ever since I first played the Portal series, it definitely set the standards for a puzzle-platformer for me.
The idea and creativity behind Portal, and Portal 2 is pure genius, a magnum opus.
I have yet to find another puzzle platformer as amazing as this.
It's my third time playing now, and I don't regret doing so. The voice acting, the atmosphere, the story the humor especially.

It's the kind of game I wish I could forget and play it over and over again.
Truly a masterpiece for a game released during its time.

10/10

Что из себя представляет Portal 2?
Плюсы
1) Отличная графика
2) Хороший сюжет
3) НЕОЖИДАННЫЙ поворот в середине игры
4) ЮМОР! Юмор Карл! В мать её головоломке!
5) Есть совместная игра
6) Отличная детализация уровней
7) Хорошая локализация
Теперь к минуса-а-а-а-а-м!!
1) Совмесная игра будто для галочки 
2) Локализация хоть и хороша но.. Некоторые фразы просто не говорятся!
3) Игра легче головоломками чем первый Portal
Ставлю ей 9.7 картофелин из 10

Amazing.
Portal 2 understands what it is, and doesn't ruin the formula. This sequel to the critcally acclaimed 2007 game is fun, witty, and even eerie at times. Yeah sure, there lot's of puzzles, but none are too hard for you to give up. Challenging but not impossble. As for the story, it's just as good. Characters are funny, the different environments are fun, and there's even a few plot twists along the way. Once your done the single player campaign, invite a friend ( or find someone online) and work together to solve new Co-Op challenges together. Personally, I didn't have a friend to play with, but I found someone online and we're now best buds.

 10/10. ''Excellent''
